welcome: Welcome to Rock > Paper > Scissor > Lizard > Spock. Good Luck!
startingPrompt: It's a race to Five. Whoever finishes first will be the Grand Winner!
startGame: Choose one: Enter 'r' for Rock, 'p' for Paper, 'sc' for Scissor, 'l' for Lizard and 'sp' for Spock:
invalidChoice: Invalid Input! Please re-enter the choice:
choiceSError: Please enter 'sc' or 'sp' for Scissor and Spock respectively
playAgainMessage: Press y to continue playing Or any other key to Exit :
